texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.ManageTaskGroupsEfficiently: Manage task groups efficiently and elegantly
texts.StartByCreatingTaskGroup: Start by creating a new task group to organize your work
texts.UpdateTaskGroupDetails: Update task group details and information
texts.TaskGroupNotFound: Task group not found or you don't have permission to access it
texts.Title: Title
texts.EnterTaskGroupTitle: Enter a descriptive title for the task group
texts.EnterTaskGroupDescription: Enter a detailed description of the task group
texts.OptionalEndDate: Optional end date for the task group
texts.ErrorLoadingTaskGroup: Error loading task group. Please try again.
texts.ErrorUpdatingTaskGroup: Error updating task group. Please try again.
texts.EndDateMustBeAfterStartDate: End date must be after start date
texts.CreateNewTaskGroupDetails: Create a new task group to organize your work
texts.SelectStartDate: Select the start date for the task group
texts.CreateTaskGroupInfo: You will be automatically assigned as the owner of this task group. You can add team members and assign tasks after creation.
texts.TipChooseDescriptiveTitle: Choose a clear and descriptive title that reflects the purpose of the task group
texts.TipAddDetailedDescription: Add a detailed description to help team members understand the goals and scope
texts.TipSetRealisticDates: Set realistic start and end dates based on your project timeline
texts.TipEndDateOptional: End date is optional - leave it empty for ongoing or indefinite task groups
texts.ErrorCreatingTaskGroup: Error creating task group. Please try again.
texts.StartDateCannotBeInPast: Start date cannot be in the past
texts.ViewAllTaskGroupsInSystem: Browse and explore all task groups in the system
texts.ErrorLoadingTaskGroups: Error loading task groups. Please try again.
texts.NoTaskGroupsMatchingCriteria: No task groups match your search criteria. Try adjusting your filters.
texts.ViewMyTaskGroups: View and manage your own task groups
texts.YouHaveNotCreatedAnyGroups: You haven't created any task groups yet. Start by creating your first group!
texts.ErrorLoadingMyGroups: Error loading your groups. Please try again.
texts.ViewTaskGroupDetailsAndManageTasks: View task group details and manage tasks
texts.TaskGroupNotFoundDescription: The task group you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have permission to access it.
texts.NoTasksFoundDescription: This task group doesn't have any tasks yet.
texts.TrackingTask:00001: Invalid date range. End date must be after start date.
texts.TrackingTask:00002: Task end date exceeds group end date.
texts.TrackingTask:00003: Cannot complete group with incomplete tasks.
texts.TrackingTask:00101: Cannot set recurrence pattern for one-time task.
texts.TrackingTask:00102: Recurrence pattern is required for recurring tasks.
texts.TrackingTask:00103: Progress already recorded for this date.
texts.TrackingTask:00201: Invalid recurrence interval. Must be greater than 0.
texts.TrackingTask:00202: Invalid recurrence occurrences. Must be greater than 0.
texts.TrackingTask:00203: Weekly recurrence requires days of week to be specified.
texts.TrackingTask:00204: Recurrence end date exceeds task item end date.
texts.TrackingTask:00302: User is already in the group.
texts.TrackingTask:00401: Invalid progress percentage. Must be between 0 and 100.
texts.TrackingTask:00402: User is not in the group.
texts.TrackingTask:00403: Task is not in the group.
texts.TrackingTask:00404: Progress already exists for this user and task.
texts.The {PropertyName} field must not exceed: The {PropertyName} field must not exceed {MaxLength} characters.
texts.CreateNewTaskInGroup: Create a new task in this group
texts.CreatingTaskForGroup: Creating a new task for this group
texts.EnterTaskTitle: Enter a descriptive title for the task
texts.EnterTaskDescription: Enter a detailed description of the task
texts.OneTimeTaskDescription: A task that needs to be completed once
texts.RecurringTaskDescription: A task that repeats on a schedule
texts.SelectRecurrenceType: Select how often this task repeats
texts.SelectRecurrenceEndDate: Select when the recurrence should end
texts.EnterNumberOfOccurrences: Enter how many times this task should repeat
texts.CreateTaskInfo: This task will be added to the current task group. All group members will be able to see and work on this task.
texts.TipChooseDescriptiveTaskTitle: Choose a clear and specific title that describes what needs to be done
texts.TipAddDetailedTaskDescription: Add detailed instructions and requirements to help team members understand the task
texts.TipSetRealisticTaskDates: Set realistic start and end dates based on task complexity and dependencies
texts.TipRecurringTasksHelp: Use recurring tasks for regular activities like reviews, reports, or maintenance
texts.ErrorCreatingTask: Error creating task. Please try again.
texts.TaskNotFoundDescription: The requested task could not be found or you don't have permission to access it.
texts.EditTaskInfo: Changes to this task will be visible to all group members. Be careful when modifying recurring tasks as it may affect future occurrences.
texts.TipChangingTaskType: Changing task type from recurring to one-time will remove the recurrence pattern
texts.TipRecurrencePatternChanges: Modifying recurrence patterns affects future task instances, not completed ones
texts.TipDateChangesAffectProgress: Changing dates may affect progress tracking and due date calculations
texts.TipSaveChangesRegularly: Save changes regularly to avoid losing your work
texts.ErrorUpdatingTask: Error updating task. Please try again.
texts.ErrorLoadingTask: Error loading task. Please try again.
texts.RecurrenceMustHaveEndDateOrOccurrences: Recurrence pattern must have either an end date or number of occurrences
texts.The {PropertyName} field has an invalid: The {PropertyName} field has an invalid value.
texts.Days of week should only be specified fo: Days of week should only be specified for weekly recurrence.
texts.Recurrence must have an end date or a nu: Recurrence must have an end date or a number of occurrences.
texts.Recurrence cannot have both end date and: Recurrence cannot have both end date and number of occurrences.
Progress date cannot be in the future.
texts.TrackingTask:00205: Recurrence must have an end date or a number of occurrences.
